description: Try our easy to follow Traditional Corned Silverside with Parsley White Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Traditional Corned Silverside with Parsley White Sauce
name: Traditional Corned Silverside with Parsley White Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon mashed potatoes onto serving plates with slices of beef, carrots and Brussels sprouts. Spoon parsley white sauce over corned beef and serve.
